trans-unit.source: Represents a sequence of glyphs from a single face of a single font at a single size, and with a single rendering style.
trans-unit.target: 表示一序列标志符号，这些标志符号来自具有一种字号和一种呈现样式的一种字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> object includes font details such as glyph indices and individual glyph positions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>对象包括字体标志符号索引和各个标志符号位置等的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: In addition, The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> object contains the original Unicode code points the run was generated from, character to glyph buffer offset mapping information, and per-character and per-glyph flags.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>对象包含从中生成运行的原始 Unicode 码位，字符标志符号缓冲区偏移量映射信息，以及每个字符和每个标志符号的标志。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> element represents the output of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> in XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>元素表示的输出<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>在 XAML 中。

trans-unit.source: The following markup syntax is used to describe the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs> element.
trans-unit.target: 以下的标记语法用于描述<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>元素。

trans-unit.source: Each glyph defines metrics that specify how it aligns with other <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>.
trans-unit.target: 每个字形定义度量值，指定与其他的对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Glyphs>。

trans-unit.source: The following graphic defines the various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters.
trans-unit.target: 以下图形定义两种不同字形字符的各种排版品质。

trans-unit.source: ![Diagraph of glyph measurements](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "Diagraph of glyph measurements")
trans-unit.target: ![标志符号度量示意图](~/add/media/glyph-example.png "标志符号度量示意图")

trans-unit.source: Various typographic qualities of two different glyph characters
trans-unit.target: 两个不同的标志符号字符的各种版式质量

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The Pixels Per Density Independent Pixel value, which is the equivalent of the scale factor.
trans-unit.target: 按“密度无关像素”单位计算的像素值，等效于比例因子。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the DPI of a screen is 120 (or 1.25 because 120/96 = 1.25) , 1.25 pixel per density independent pixel is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果屏幕的 DPI 为 120（或 1.25，因为 120/96 = 1.25），那么“密度无关像素”值为 1.25。

trans-unit.source: DIP is the unit of measurement used by WPF to be independent of device resolution and DPIs.
trans-unit.target: DPI 是 WPF 采用的独立于设备分辨率和 DPI 的度量单位。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> class by specifying properties of the class.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定类的属性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IList`1" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> class by specifying properties of the class.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定类的属性，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> values that represent the advance widths corresponding to the glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值的列表，这些值表示对应于字形索引的步进宽度。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Double" /> values that represent the advance widths.
trans-unit.target: 表示步进宽度的 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: Each item in the list of advance widths corresponds to the glyph values returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GlyphIndices%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每个列表中的前进宽度的项对应于返回的标志符号值<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GlyphIndices%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The nominal origin of the n<sup>th</sup> glyph in the run (n>0) is the nominal origin of the n-1<sup>th</sup> glyph plus the n-1<sup>th</sup> advance width added along the runs advance vector.
trans-unit.target: N 的名义原点<sup>th</sup>运行中的标志符号 (n > 0) n-1 的名义原点是<sup>th</sup>标志符号加上 n-1<sup>th</sup>步进沿运行步进向量增加的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Base glyphs generally have a non-zero advance width, whereas combining glyphs generally have a zero advance width.
trans-unit.target: 基标志符号通常有一个非零的步进宽度，而合并的标志符号通常具有零步进宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the baseline origin of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的基线原点。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> value representing the baseline origin.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示基线原点的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bidirectional nesting level of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的双向嵌套级别。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents the bidirectional nesting level.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示双向嵌套级别的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> corresponding to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> 相对应的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> returned contains the combined geometry of all glyphs in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>返回包含中的所有标志符号的组合的几何图形<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: Overlapping contours are merged by performing a Boolean union operation.
trans-unit.target: 通过执行 boolean 类型的值的联合操作合并重叠的轮廓线。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> values that determine whether there are caret stops for every UTF16 code point in the Unicode representing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值的列表，这些值确定表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的 Unicode 中每个 UTF16 码位是否具有脱字符。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> values that represent whether there are caret stops.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否有脱字符的 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: The return value is `null` if there is a caret stop for every UTF16 code point in the Unicode representing the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是`null`如果没有在 Unicode 表示每个 UTF16 代码点脱<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of UTF16 code points that represent the Unicode content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的 Unicode 内容的 UTF16 码位列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Char" /> values that represent Unicode content.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Unicode 内容的 <see cref="T:System.Char" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the list of <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> values that maps characters in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> to glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中的字符映射到字形索引的 <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> values that represent mapped glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 表示映射的字形索引的 <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: There is one entry per character in the list.
trans-unit.target: 没有每个列表中的字符的一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Each value in the list gives the offset of the first glyph, represented by <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GlyphIndices%2A>, to the corresponding character, represented by <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.Characters%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中的每个值提供的第一个字形对齐，由表示的偏移量<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GlyphIndices%2A>，由表示的相应字符<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.Characters%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Where multiple characters map to a single glyph, or to a glyph group that cannot be broken down to map exactly to individual characters, the entries for all the characters have the same value: the offset of the first glyph that represents this group of characters.
trans-unit.target: 其中的多个字符将映射到单个标志符号，或不能为细分为映射完全到单独字符的标志符号组，所有字符的项具有相同的值： 表示此组的字符的第一个标志符号的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If the list is `null` or equal to <xref:System.String.Empty>, sequential 1 to 1 mapping is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果列表为`null`于或等于<xref:System.String.Empty>，假定顺序 1 对 1 映射。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the alignment box for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 搜索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的对齐框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the alignment box for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的对齐框。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Rect> is relative to the origin of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Rect>是相对于源的<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the ink bounding box for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的墨迹边界框。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the ink bounding box the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的墨迹边界框。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Rect> is relative to the origin of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Rect>是相对于源的<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific device font for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> has been optimized.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置已优化其 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的特定设备字体。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that represents the device font.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示设备字体的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> is rendered on a device that has built-in support for the named device font, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> should be rendered using a device specific mechanism for selecting that font, and by sending Unicode code points rather than glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>已命名的设备字体的内置支持的设备上呈现<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>应使用设备特定机制，用于选择该字体，并发送 Unicode 码位，而不是标志符号索引呈现。

trans-unit.source: When rendering onto a device that does not include built-in support for the named device font, <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.DeviceFontName%2A> should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现的设备上不包括命名的设备字体的内置支持时<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.DeviceFontName%2A>应忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the em size used for rendering the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于呈现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的全身大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> value that represents the em size used for rendering.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" /> 值，表示用于呈现的全身大小。

trans-unit.source: Offset to use for computing the caret character hit.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算插入符号字符命中的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the character hit is inside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符命中是否在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> value that represents the character hit of the caret of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 值，该值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的插入符号的字符命中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> value that represents the character hit that is closest to the <paramref name="distance" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> 值，表示与 <paramref name="distance" /> 值最接近的字符命中。

trans-unit.source: The out parameter <paramref name="isInside" /> returns <see langword="true" /> if the character hit is inside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符命中在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 内，则输出参数 <paramref name="isInside" /> 返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `distance` value represents the offset from the leading edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: `distance`值表示从前导边缘的偏移量<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: If the hit is outside the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>, the character hit represents the closest caret character hit within the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: 如果命中之外，则<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>，字符命中表示命中中的最接近的插入符号字符<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit> structure represents information about a character hit within a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>—the index of the first character that was hit as well as information about the leading or trailing edge.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit>结构表示关于命中中字符的信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>-已命中，以及有关前导或尾随边缘的信息的第一个字符的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> to use for computing the offset.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算偏移量的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the offset from the leading edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the specified character hit.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的前导边缘相对于脱字符（包含指定的字符命中）的前导边缘或尾随边缘的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the offset from the leading edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> to the leading or trailing edge of a caret stop containing the character hit.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Double" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 的前导边缘相对于脱字符（包含字符命中）的前导或尾随边缘的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> is not hit testable, the distance of 0.0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>则不会命中 0.0 的距离返回的可测试性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.IsHitTestable%2A> property to determine if a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun> can be hit test.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.IsHitTestable%2A>属性来确定如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>可以命中测试。

trans-unit.source: The character hit is outside the range specified by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> Unicode string.
trans-unit.target: 字符命中在由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> Unicode 字符串指定的范围外部。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> to use for computing the next hit value.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算下一个命中值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the next valid caret character hit in the logical direction in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中逻辑方向上的下一个有效插入符号字符命中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> that represents the next valid caret character hit in the logical direction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" />，表示逻辑方向上的下一个有效脱字符命中。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is equal to <paramref name="characterHit" />, no further navigation is possible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值与 <paramref name="characterHit" /> 相等，则 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中不可能有进一步导航。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the previous valid caret character hit, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索以前的有效插入符号字符命中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GetPreviousCaretCharacterHit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> to use for computing the previous hit value.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算上一个命中值的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the previous valid caret character hit in the logical direction in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中逻辑方向上的上一个有效插入符号字符命中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" /> that represents the previous valid caret character hit in the logical direction.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.CharacterHit" />，表示逻辑方向上的上一个有效插入符号字符命中。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is equal to <paramref name="characterHit" />, no further navigation is possible in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值与 <paramref name="characterHit" /> 相等，则 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中不可能有进一步导航。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the next valid caret character hit, use <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GetNextCaretCharacterHit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索下一步的有效插入符号字符命中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.GetNextCaretCharacterHit%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> values that represent the glyph indices in the rendering physical font.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> 值的数组，这些值表示采用呈现物理字体的标志符号索引。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> values that represent the glyph indices.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.UInt16" /> 值列表，这些值表示标志符号索引。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the glyph indices are defined by the font's character map table for the corresponding Unicode code points in the inner text.
trans-unit.target: 默认值的标志符号索引定义由内部文本中的相应的 Unicode 码位的字体的字符映射表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> values representing the offsets of the glyphs in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值的数组，这些值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中字形的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A list of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> values representing the offsets of glyph.
trans-unit.target: 表示字形偏移量的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> 值列表。

trans-unit.source: The glyph offset values are added to the nominal glyph origin to generate the final origin for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 标志符号偏移量的值添加到名义标志符号 origin，以便生成最终原点的标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.AdvanceWidths%2A> property represents the values of the nominal glyph origins for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.AdvanceWidths%2A>属性表示的值的名义标志符号来源<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun>。

trans-unit.source: Base glyphs generally have a glyph offset of (0, 0), combining glyphs generally have an offset that places them correctly on top of the nearest preceding base glyph.
trans-unit.target: 基标志符号通常具有标志符号偏移量 （0，0），合并的标志符号通常有顶端前面最近正确放置的偏移量基标志符号。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphTypeface" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are any valid caret character hits within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" /> 中是否存在任何有效的插入符号字符命中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there are valid caret character hits; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在有效的插入符号字符命中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to rotate glyphs.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否旋转标志字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the glyphs are rotated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以旋转该标志字符，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.IsSideways%2A> is `true`, the glyphs that make up text characters are rotated 90° counter-clockwise, using vertical baseline positioning metrics.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.IsSideways%2A>是`true`，构成文本字符的标志符号是逆时针旋转，使用垂直基线定位度量值方向旋转 90 °。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.XmlLanguage" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun" />。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the PixelsPerDip at which the text should be rendered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置呈现文本时应使用的 PixelsPerDip。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.PixelsPerDip" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun.PixelsPerDip" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.BeginInit" />。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize.EndInit" />。
